amendment.description: To make technical corrections in the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3306 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3306 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blumenthal. (consideration: CR S882; text: CR S882) To make technical corrections in the preamble.
